UseCaseTitle: OptiTravel: Agentic AI for Travel & Expense Process Optimization at RHIM
Purpose: To streamline, automate, and optimize RHIM�s travel & expense (T&E) processes using agentic AI, ensuring compliance, reducing leakage, improving employee experience, and delivering real-time financial insights.
ExecSummary: RHIM manages a global workforce with high travel frequency, resulting in complex expense management challenges. Traditional rule-based expense auditing is reactive, costly, and prone to errors or leakage. The OptiTravel platform leverages Agentic AI to autonomously validate, optimize, and reconcile T&E claims in real time. Multi-agent collaboration ensures compliance, detects anomalies, and streamlines reimbursements, ultimately lowering operational costs and improving employee satisfaction.

overview: OptiTravel is an enterprise-grade Agentic AI platform for Travel & Expense optimization at RHIM. It combines multi-agent systems, contextual memory, policy knowledge graphs, and semantic anomaly detection to autonomously validate, optimize, and audit T&E submissions. It reduces manual intervention, improves compliance, and ensures financial efficiency.

approach: The platform leverages LangGraph for orchestration, Neo4j knowledge graphs for policy/contextual validation, and Faiss-powered anomaly detection for identifying fraudulent or duplicate claims. Agents collaborate via contextual memory to ensure modularity, scalability, and traceability across RHIM�s financial operations.

dataflow: Expense claims and receipts are ingested into OptiTravel. The Expense Validation and Policy Compliance Agents flag duplicates or policy violations. The Anomaly Detection Agent identifies fraud or unusual patterns. The Reimbursement Agent auto-approves or escalates claims. The Supervisor Agent oversees workflows and governance, with contextual memory retaining full history for audits.
design: Agents are modular, event-driven, and orchestrated by LangGraph. They use contextual memory, integrate with finance/ERP APIs, and employ Neo4j for compliance and Faiss for anomaly detection. Supervisor Agent ensures governance, resilience, and audit readiness.
